name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
Adidas Runners WWWR - Miles with her
Adidas Runners Run & Talk Session with Cardiologist Dr. Purnima and Sebani
about:
💕 Run & Talk Session with Cardiologist Dr. Purnima and Sebani AR crew

Run for Your Heart — WWWR Special Ally Session 💫

This month, we go beyond miles — we focus on the heart that powers them all. 💕

Join us for an easy 5 km run, followed by a Heart Health Talk with Dr. Purnima Choudary, Senior Resident – Interventional Cardiology, Manipal Hospital.

With 9 years of experience, Dr. Purnima has been actively working on women’s, sexual, and cardiac health education, conducting over 50 CPR trainings and health talks across schools and colleges — all driven by her motto, “Prevention is better than cure.”

An inspiring personality beyond the white coat, Dr. Purnima is also a passionate runner, having completed 10 km and 21 km races, and a travel explorer who believes in living life to the fullest one heartbeat at a time.

Hosted by the Adidas Runners Women We Run community and open to all allies, this session is about learning how to care for our hearts, run stronger, and inspire others to do the same. 🏃‍♀️🏃‍♂️✨

🗓️ Date: 25th Oct
📍 Venue: Adidas Store, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar
🕒 Time: 6:00 AM

It’s not just about pace or distance it’s about staying strong from the inside out. 💕🌸

🎤 Exclusive Q&A: Women on the House with Purnima & Sebani
